responses.rationale: The segment provides factual information about cooking temperatures without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes a factual event ('dead-end infections') without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment introduces a source without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
A quoted source uses the phrase 'at the top of the list in terms of bad guy viruses' to frame the virus alarmingly.
The segment discusses research needs and conditions factually, without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
